name: nightshift
description:
NIGHTSHIFT


Feel the retro vibes of the ‘80s with the colorful experience of NIGHTSHIFT - an 8-bit visual and playable arcade experience! Make your way on the highway, collect all the cassettes, boost your speed and reach Synthecity!

Our hero NIGHTSHIFT has to bring important documents to the extraction point. Will he reach Synthecity before it's too late?

You’re NIGHTSHIFT - a special agent of the secret services on a mission:

Make your way on the highway crowded with palms, neon buildings and bisons!

On your way you’ll have to sharp your senses to avoid all the obstacles, jump over incoming cars, stay away from the traffic and look out for roadworks!

Do you like to collect stuff? Grab all the cassettes! Hidden deviations will lead you to the ‘80s Gold cassette!

With the soundtrack DLC you can download the NIGHTSHIFT OST as well as more synthwave tracks of Robin Bressani.
